```{r, echo = FALSE, results = "hide"}
f1 <- sample(1:20, 1)
f2 <- sample(1:20, 1)
ans <- signif(sqrt(f1^2 + f2^2), 3)

distractors <- c(f1 + f2, abs(f2 - f1))
sc <- num_to_schoice(ans, wrong = distractors, delta = ans/10, digits = 1, format = FALSE)
sc$questions <- sprintf("%g N", sc$questions)
```

Question
========
Adam pulls on a box with `r fmt(f1, 1)` N of force. Bob pulls on the the same box with 
`r fmt(f2, 1)` N of force, at a right angle to Adam's force. What is the magnitude of the
net force on the box?

```{r, echo = FALSE, results = "asis"}
answerlist(sc$questions, markup = "markdown")
```


Solution
========
Perpendicular forces are added using the Pythagorean theorem.
$$F_{net} = \sqrt{F_1^2 + F_2^2} = \sqrt{(`r f1` N)^2 + (`r f2` N)^2} = `r ans` \text{ N}$$
